plot: 24 year old call girl "Jenny" and 14 year old runaway girl "Amanda" try to survive the night and escape from "Marlon", a diabolic thug who wants the girls captured under the suspicion of killing his father.
title: Train to Kandy
plot_es: 24 year old call girl "Jenny" and 14 year old runaway girl "Amanda" try to survive the night and escape from "Marlon", a diabolic thug who wants the girls captured under the suspicion of killing his father.
plot_en: 24 year old call girl "Jenny" and 14 year old runaway girl "Amanda" try to survive the night and escape from "Marlon", a diabolic thug who wants the girls captured under the suspicion of killing his father.
